name: Mini Golf Forever
description:
Mini Golf Forever

Chill out with some relaxing mini golf. With unlimited procedurally generated courses, you'll never be bored again! (Assuming you're very easily entertained)

Play for free, or donate an outrageous amount of money. Either way, you won't be acknowledged.

This is a work-in-progress game that contains:

  • Loops
  • Courses that collide with themselves
  • Hills
  • Impossible to get par scores
  • Curves
  • Way too easy to get par scores
  • Standard Unity skyboxes

 More coming soon, including:

  • More obstacles
  • More types of courses
  • Online multiplayer
  • Golf ball customization
  • Maybe an actually good looking skybox if I'm really feeling it one day
Controls

Move the mouse to aim

Hold left mouse button and drag the mouse forward to choose power

Scroll with the mouse-wheel to zoom in or out

R to reset to last position

N to go to a new level

Escape to quit

Feedback

Please please please let me know what you think about the game in the comments below.  Or don't. Whatever.
